According to NY state law, every 20 years we have a ballot measure on a constitutional convention. If the measure passes, we'll have a constitutional convention, and we will elect delegates to meet and discuss/perform changes to our state Constitution.
One of the big hot topics is upstate. One proposal is to create two autonomous regions within NY, and one proposal is for upstate to secede entirely.
